DOC.brief_summary: This study do test possible benefit task-specific focused ankle train use Ankle-Bot subject Multiple Sclerosis `` foot-drop . '' The study also compare effectiveness task-specific focused ankle train use Ankle-Bot conventional focus ankle therapy improve gait subject MS .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Targeted Lower Extremity Joint Training Multiple Sclerosis ( MS ) Gait Abnormalities
DOC.criteria: Clinical Diagnosis MS EDSS level 3.5 6.0 Unilateral footdrop Able ambulate 25 ft. unilateral assistive device Lower extremity injury limit range motion function Unable demonstrate understand process study and/or fully understand instruction order safely participate study use study equipment Unable fit safely properly AnkleBot device
